oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Small leather purse
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This small leather purse was found inside the soldier's housewife (hayw016) that Mary Austin Pitt made for her husband, Pvt. Henry Pitt, Co. B, 7th Tenn. Cav., CSA, who served under Gen. Nathan Bedford Forrest and died of wounds received at the Battle of; Brice's Crossroads in Mississippi in 1864.
